verses.verse: How hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5743>covered<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with a <S%H5743>cloud<s%> in his <S%H639>anger<s%>! He hath cast <S%H7993>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth<s%> the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, And hath not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1916>footstool<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> all the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and hath not <S%H2550>pitied<s%>: He hath thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> in his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> the <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; He hath brought them <S%H5060>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; he hath <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> and the princes <S%H8269>thereof<s%>.

He hath cut <S%H1438>off<s%> in <S%H2750>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> all the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; He hath <S%H7725>drawn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>: And he hath <S%H1197>burned<s%> up <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> like a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, which <S%H398>devoureth<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

He hath <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%> like an <S%H341>enemy<s%>, he hath <S%H5324>stood<s%> with his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> as an <S%H6862>adversary<s%>, And hath <S%H2026>slain<s%> all that were <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H5869>eye<s%>: In the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> he hath poured <S%H8210>out<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is become as an <S%H341>enemy<s%>, he hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; He hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> all her <S%H759>palaces<s%>, he hath <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> his <S%H4013>strongholds<s%>; And he hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8386>mourning<s%> and <S%H592>lamentation<s%>.

And he hath violently taken <S%H2554>away<s%> his <S%H7900>tabernacle<s%>, as if it were of a <S%H1588>garden<s%>; he hath <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> his place of <S%H4150>assembly<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath caused solemn <S%H4150>assembly<s%> and <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, And hath <S%H5006>despised<s%> in the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath cast <S%H2186>off<s%> his <S%H4196>altar<s%>, he hath <S%H5010>abhorred<s%> his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; He hath given <S%H5462>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of her <S%H759>palaces<s%>: They have <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H6963>noise<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of a solemn <S%H4150>assembly<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H2803>purposed<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; He hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H6957>line<s%>, he hath not <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H1104>destroying<s%>; And he hath made the <S%H2426>rampart<s%> and <S%H2346>wall<s%> to <S%H56>lament<s%>; they <S%H535>languish<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

Her <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> into the <S%H776>ground<s%>; he hath <S%H6>destroyed<s%> and <S%H7665>broken<s%> her <S%H1280>bars<s%>: Her <S%H4428>king<s%> and her <S%H8269>princes<s%> are among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H5030>not<s%>; Yea, her prophets <S%H4672>find<s%> no <S%H2377>vision<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, they keep <S%H1826>silence<s%>; They have cast <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>; They have <S%H2296>girded<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>: The <S%H1330>virgins<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> hang <S%H3381>down<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> do <S%H3615>fail<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, my <S%H4578>heart<s%> is <S%H2560>troubled<s%>; My <S%H3516>liver<s%> is <S%H8210>poured<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, because of the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, Because the young <S%H5768>children<s%> and the <S%H3243>sucklings<s%> <S%H5848>swoon<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H7151>city<s%>.

They <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H517>mothers<s%>, Where is <S%H1715>grain<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%>? When they <S%H5848>swoon<s%> as the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, When their <S%H5315>soul<s%> is poured <S%H8210>out<s%> into their <S%H517>mothers<s%>' <S%H2436>bosom<s%>.

What shall I <S%H5749>testify<s%> unto <S%H4100>thee<s%>? what shall I <S%H1819>liken<s%> to <S%H1323>thee<s%>, O daughter of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>? What shall I <S%H7737>compare<s%> to <S%H5162>thee<s%>, that I may comfort <S%H1330>thee<s%>, O virgin <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>? For thy <S%H7667>breach<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> like the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: who can heal <S%H7495>thee<s%>?

Thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> for thee <S%H7723>false<s%> and foolish <S%H8602>visions<s%>; And they have not <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, to bring <S%H7725>back<s%> thy <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, But have <S%H2372>seen<s%> for thee <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H4864>oracles<s%> and causes of <S%H4065>banishment<s%>.

All that <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H5606>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> at <S%H1870>thee<s%>; They <S%H8319>hiss<s%> and <S%H5128>wag<s%> their <S%H7218>head<s%> at the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H5892>saying<s%>, Is this the city that men <S%H559>called<s%> The <S%H3632>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, The <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>?

All thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H6475>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> wide against <S%H8319>thee<s%>; They hiss and <S%H2786>gnash<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%>; they <S%H559>say<s%>, We have swallowed her <S%H1104>up<s%>; <S%H389>Certainly<s%> this is the <S%H3117>day<s%> that we looked <S%H6960>for<s%>; we have <S%H4672>found<s%>, we have seen <S%H7200>it<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> that which he <S%H2161>purposed<s%>; He hath <S%H1214>fulfilled<s%> his <S%H565>word<s%> that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>; He hath thrown <S%H2040>down<s%>, and hath not <S%H2550>pitied<s%>: And he hath caused the <S%H341>enemy<s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over <S%H7311>thee<s%>; He hath exalted the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of thine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.

Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: O <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, let <S%H1832>tears<s%> run <S%H3381>down<s%> like a <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>; <S%H5414>Give<s%> thyself no <S%H6314>respite<s%>; let not the <S%H1323>apple<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1826>cease<s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, cry <S%H7442>out<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, at the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H821>watches<s%>; Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward him for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of thy young <S%H5768>children<s%>, that <S%H5848>faint<s%> for <S%H7458>hunger<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H2351>street<s%>.

See <S%H7200><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> to whom thou hast <S%H5953>done<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%>! Shall the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, the <S%H5768>children<s%> that are <S%H2949>dandled<s%> in the <S%H3548>hands<s%>? Shall the priest and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H2026>slain<s%> in the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%>?

The <S%H5288>youth<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> man <S%H7901>lie<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>; My <S%H1330>virgins<s%> and my young <S%H970>men<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: Thou hast <S%H2026>slain<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thine <S%H639>anger<s%>; Thou hast <S%H2873>slaughtered<s%>, and not <S%H2550>pitied<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H7121>called<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of a <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H4032>assembly<s%>, my terrors on every <S%H5439>side<s%>; And there was none that <S%H6412>escaped<s%> or <S%H8300>remained<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%>: Those that I have <S%H2946>dandled<s%> and brought <S%H7235>up<s%> hath mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.
